MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the WA6 postcode area of Frodsham, affecting properties in Alvanley Road, South Bank and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11AM to remove a tree from our overhead lines. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:10AM on 6th February 2021
